message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'm willing to negotiate in the future.
Let's meet in the middle, we both get a fair share
I think an even split is the fairest option. We both get a decent amount, and we can avoid further negotiation.
Considering inflation, I think I deserve a bit more. This is my compromise
I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one. Inflation is hitting us both, but I think this is a fair compromise.
